title: I guess star guardian Jinx also has anorexia...?
body:
https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ES1Ao21PUMI/V-BRs66USAI/AAAAAAAAUn4/2kQ3CPS8zoEms2iQDgDM3Gn7qa_KJ8SKgCEw/s640/Jinx_1920x1080.jpg


I was hyped for the star guardian skins but this is really... strange... The colours are kinda of  too

I love the idea of star guardian jinx but 

They should try making the Splash art more like this

http://image.prntscr.com/image/9da51e14bdb84d6abebe0d1be89bed6d.png

replies.body: Idk, i think the actual splashart conveys jinx more than the bottom picture, even though she's in a team... she still has to keep her overall mindset and attitude. according to what they said, SG jinx still has her spunky rebellious violent behavior. What color better portrays that than Red and the other colors do a nice job at bringing that red to your eyes.... if anything the bottom picture is more weird to me.
Thats not the problem, it's how weak the colors are and how anorexic she looks... otherwise she looks fine its just she looks like she's about to die
Eh, she looks as skinny as she does in any other of her splasharts, her classic splashart makes her look even smaller

i really dont think poppy fits the whole , star guardian theme , idk ... ahri  has the looks for it , soraka , sona , even though they have enough skins already , just saying look wise , 

;-; annie too , idk ... im just not a fan of the poppy one , the rest are fine

> [{quoted}](name=Kid Kanji,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=I2fXFatQ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-09-20T08:14:56.179+0000)
>
> i really dont think poppy fits the whole , star guardian theme , idk ... ahri  has the looks for it , soraka , sona , even though they have enough skins already , just saying look wise , 
> 
> ;-; annie too , idk ... im just not a fan of the poppy one , the rest are fine

I was kinda hoping karma would get one
beats having another poppy skin :)
( I really don't like poppy and I know this skin is going to breathe more life into her )

Jinx is probably the thinnest female champ, she's flat, and young, thats even in her default skin she looks very thin.

Personally im gonna wait for het VO, i love jinx crazy personality, im gonna see how they transfer her to SG (even tho i dont like the skin line)

> Personally im gonna wait for het VO, i love jinx crazy personality, im gonna see how they transfer her to SG (even tho i dont like the skin line)

naw , kalista is , most likely
She still looks way too weird , lots of lost potential :/
